activities: Mary Kay Inc. is the parent corporation of E.U. entities that collect data in the E.U., including personally identifiable information.  Access to such data in the U.S. is necessary for the efficient processing, support and business continuity of the E.U. based subsidiaries.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, Deputy General Counsel and Assistant Corporate Secretary
eucountries: Czech Republic, Finland, Germany, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization and customer data.  Data sent to the US does not include manually processed data.
